text: Silent Witnesses () is a 1914 Russian silent drama movie directed by Yevgeni Bauer.Московская «Ночь в музее». Где бесплатно послушать джаз, посмотреть балет и световое шоуНемые свидетели It stars Aleksandr Chargonin, Aleksandr Kheruvimov, and Dora Chitorina. == Actors == * Aleksandr Chargonin as Pavel Kostritsyn * Aleksandr Kheruvimov as The Porter * Dora Chitorina as Nastya * Elsa Krueger as Yelena * Andrey Gromov == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:Russian silent movies Category:1914 drama movies Category:Movies directed by Yevgeni Bauer
title: Silent Witnesses
